I uploaded a photo, from Tama, of a memorial pillar at Mibu Temple 
it turns out that the engraved words on the pillar are from the song 
translated by Serizawa Kamo in message #1271!

I placed the translation and picture of the pillar onto one image 
and uploaded it to "PHOTOS" >>> SHINSENGUMI ARTICLES.

If you are new and haven't heard the song yet please visit 
http://www.streamload.com/green_2
click on "shinsengumi"
then go to the "Shinsengumi, Articles, Screencaps, TMPD, 
Seinan/Satsuma, Music Vids, Scanlations" folder
and search for "Aa Shinsengumi" MP3
[password] miburo

wouldn't it be neat of some of the song lyrics are remixed into a 
more modern format? ^_^  (I actually like it the way it is too)

Again everyone can thank Tama and Serizawa Kamo for their 
contributions!
